Messages.Author: Ivan Argatov
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Based on feedback from the lecture audience, there have been some adjustments to the schedule: Both Lectures and Tutorials will be held on Wednesday from 10:05 AM to 12:00 PM. Thank you for your attention and cooperation. Best regards, Ivan Argatov

Messages.Author: Ivan Argatov
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Based on feedback from the lecture audience, there have been some adjustments to the schedule: Lectures on Tuesday will now commence at 8:30 AM. Tutorials on Wednesday will begin at 10:05 AM. Thank you for your attention and cooperation. Best regards, Ivan Argatov

Messages.Author: Ivan Argatov
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I am pleased to welcome you to this lecture course. The lectures and tutorials will take place in Room M123 as per the timetable. To successfully complete the course, it is necessary to finish at least 50% of the homework assignments. If you encounter any challenging problems in individual assignments, you are encouraged to collaborate with your peers. Group work is also encouraged. Kind regards, Ivan Argatov
